subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: San Jose forward Ryane Clowe was arrested early Monday morning on suspicion of drunken driving in Los Gatos, Calif. Clowe, who has been out of the lineup after having knee surgery, is the second Sharks player in two seasons to be arrested on that charge, despite a policy to reimburse Sharks players or staff members for a taxi or car service if they need transportation.
